meaning_str.bing:
n. 注意；关注；注意力；关心
int. 注意；立正
网络. 引起注意；注目；注意事项

引起注意；注目；注意事项

注意力；注意；关注；专心；留心；关心；照顾；照料；敬意；立正姿势

1.en: His eyes are going back and forth, up to me to see what I'm looking at, so we've got shared attention.
1.cn: 他的眼睛前后移动，看着我正在看的东西，所以我们有共同的关注点。

2.en: For some time, the question of Darfur, Sudan has been a focus of attention of the international community.
2.cn: 一段时间以来，苏丹达尔富尔问题是国际社会关注的焦点之一。

3.en: Connor. It just recently came to my attention and I thought you might be interested in it.
3.cn: 我最近才注意到它，我想你也会对此感兴趣的。

0.en: Attention, all initiates report for final testing.
0.cn: 请注意，所有新成员，来最终测验报道。

1.en: They certainly know how to take advantage of media attention.
1.cn: 他们懂得如何利用媒体注意。

2.en: Attention. Return to start positions. Return to start positions.
2.cn: 注意，回到初始位置，回到初始位置。

3.en: Attention, all S.H.I.E.L.D agents. This is Steve Rogers.
3.cn: 神盾局全体特工请注意，我是史蒂夫罗杰斯。

4.en: Pay attention, Leonard. That's why she can't play on Sunday.
4.cn: 注意力集中点，莱纳德。这是她周日不能来的原因。

5.en: That's just so we don't draw attention to the congressional race.
5.cn: 那只是为了不让国会竞选吸引太多注意。

6.en: I can't seem to get her attention. Or even say the right thing.
6.cn: 我似乎无法引起她的注意，甚至都没法把话说对。

7.en: It's gotta be a killer app to get the attention of the right people.
7.cn: 必须是杀手级应用软件才能吸引到目标人士的注意。

8.en: And no one's paying attention. No one is paying attention. Because the banks are too busy getting paid obscene fees to sell these bonds.
8.cn: 没有人会注意到，没有人在意，因为银行正忙着卖这些债券好赚黑心钱。

9.en: Attention, everyone. We have an announcement. Jaws Theta Chi has been disqualified.
9.cn: 大家注意，我们有事宣布，猛将会取消资格。

10.en: Kevin! Kevin! Kevin Kevin Kev... Hey, Kevin. Hey. Ow. Hey. Pay attention.
10.cn: 凯文！凯文，凯文...嘿，凯文。嘿。哦。嘿，注意听。

11.en: Can I have your attention, everyone? That's, B-flat, for those who don't have perfect pitch.
11.cn: 大家请注意，给没有绝对音感的人，这是降B调。

12.en: It's come to our attention that you've transported toxic chemicals through the U.S. Postal Service.
12.cn: 我们注意到你通过邮政部门运送了有毒化学品。

13.en: All right, everyone pay attention. Yes, I have a friend named Amy Farrah Fowler.
13.cn: 好吧，各单位注意，没错，我是有个朋友叫艾米·菲拉·福勒。

14.en: You're not listening. Why is nobody listening to me when I talk? Are you paying attention?
14.cn: 你们没在听，为什么没人听我说话？你们有注意听吗？

15.en: Good morning. If I could have everyone's attention, please? I know we're all eager to get on the road to Big Sur.
15.cn: 早上好，大家请注意？我知道我们都想尽快开往大苏。

16.en: Welcome to the Astronaut Candidate Program. Now pay attention, because this could save your life.
16.cn: 欢迎来到宇航员预备计划，现在请注意听, 因为可能会救你一命。

17.en: Attention, Matthews family and Freako Morgenstern! We need to teach Maya the meaning of Christmas.
17.cn: 注意了，马修斯一家和怪人摩根斯，我们要教会玛雅圣诞节的意义。

18.en: He gave me a mug. What do you think I'm drinking out of? Do you even pay attention? Honestly, less and less.
18.cn: 他有送我杯子。不然我在用什么喝水？你都有注意人家吗？老实说，越来越少了。

19.en: Well, do go on. People spend all this money to have their daughters basically dance in front of others for attention.
19.cn: 请继续说。人们花那么多钱来养一个女儿就是为了在别人面前跳舞而引起注意。
